changeValuation(uint256,uint256).details: call this to change the percieved valuation of the token.

params._tokenId: The identifier of the token to change valuation of.
params._valuation: The new valuation of the token.

collect(uint256).details: call this to manually send pending taxes to the collector. This function should be callable by any external party.

params._tokenId: The identifier of the token to pay taxes for.

defund(uint256,uint256).details: call this to remove excess funding for the token. if the resultant fund for the token was zero, it must be revoked.

params._tokenId: The identifier of the token to defund.
params._value: The amount to retrieve from the token's fund.

fund(uint256,uint256).details: call this to fund the item, to pay for the maintenance taxes.

params._tokenId: The identifier of the token to fund.
params._value: The amount sent to fund the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revoke(uint256).details: call this to revoke ownership of a token.

params._tokenId: The identifier of the token to revoke.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
